subject: Sony Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tommy Haas’s unexpected surge in the Sony Open ended with a semifinal loss to David Ferrer, who will face Andy Murray in the final. Haas made clear it wasn’t the end for him.
snippet: Tommy Haas’s unexpected surge in the Sony Open ended with a semifinal loss to David Ferrer, who will face Andy Murray in the final. Haas made clear it wasn’t the end for him.
